<NEW>

Wheelie shrugged quietly, "The future already has been =
set to change.  With us here and making our home on the range.  Whatever it=
 is, it shall come to pass.  We have already changed that, alas."

Continui=
ng, "What we know of the future, already in doubt.  We've done too much her=
e to reset it about.  If the Decepticons shall do it, the Predacons are wro=
ng, then perhaps we have to fight them, with our own sort of song."

Pointi=
ng over at one of the auxiliary screens of Teletraan One, "Cybertron exists=
 here, at war and at peace.  Here in the past, they are starved for release=
.  Would it it not be so simple, to just send a message?  To the AUtobots t=
here we can send a message of hope.  That Prime is still alive, the Matrix =
a trope.  Shockwave is a bureaucrat, useless, aghast.  Would we be able to =
turn things about from the past?  For Megatron wants to rule..  Not Megatro=
n that was, his own self to school.  So, he would not think of contacting S=
hockwave.  So we could send for reinforcements and change the war laudwave.=
"
